StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegePro.lePFT]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @Organiza.onType varchar(3) DECLARE @ChildOrgType varchar(3)
SELECT [CollegePro.lePFTID], cpp.[CollegePro.leID], cp.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, cp.FiscalYear, hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, cpp.[PullUpLoca.on] ,cpp.[CrunchLoca.on] ,cpp.[RunRoute], cpp.PushUpLoca.on
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.lePFT] cpp INNER JOIN [CollegePro.le] cp ON cpp.CollegePro.leID = cp.CollegePro.leID INNER JOIN [dbo].High_School hs ON cp.school_code = hs.school_code
WHERE cp.SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear ORDER BY cp.[SCHOOL_CODE]
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
